title: National mapping and assessment of ecosystem services projects in Europe – Participants’ experiences, state of the art and lessons learned
content:
Publication date: February 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 65

Author(s): Ágnes Vári, Cristian Mihai Adamescu, Mario Balzan, Kremena Gocheva, Martin Götzl, Karsten Grunewald, Miguel Inácio, Madli Linder, Grégory Obiang-Ndong, Paulo Pereira, Fernando Santos-Martin, Ina Sieber, Małgorzata Stępniewska, Eszter Tanács, Mette Termansen, Eric Tromeur, Davina Vačkářová, Bálint Czúcz
